item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: chrissyroshak2
item.content:encoded:
Last Updated: October 17, 2023 marketing.chrissyroshak.com ("we," "us," or "our") is committed to safeguarding your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and protect the data you provide while using our website, marketing.chrissyroshak.com. Please take a moment to read this Privacy Policy to understand how we handle your information. By accessing and using our website, you consent to the practices described herein.

Information We Collect

We do not collect any personally identifiable information from visitors who browse our website. We do not request or require any login information or personal data to access our website's content.

Cookies and Tracking Technology

Our website may use cookies or similar tracking technologies to collect standard internet log information and visitor behavior patterns. We use this information to analyze site traffic and optimize your experience. These tools do not collect personally identifiable information. You can adjust your browser settings to refuse cookies if you choose. Please note that this may affect your ability to access certain features on our website.

Third Party Links

Our website may include links to third-party websites or services for your convenience. Please be aware that these external sites have their own privacy policies, which we do not control. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any website you visit.

Data Security

We take the security of your data seriously. While we cannot guarantee the security of data transmission over the internet, we have implemented appropriate security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction.

Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be reflected on this page with a revised "Last Updated" date. It is your responsibility to check this page periodically for updates. By continuing to use our website after any changes are made, you acknowledge your acceptance of those changes.

Contact Us

If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or the way we handle your data, please contact us at: [Your Contact Information] We value your privacy and appreciate your trust in us. Thank you for visiting our website and reviewing our Privacy Policy.

item.title: Contact
item.dc:creator: chrissyroshak2
item.content:encoded:
Let's to work together

Like my portfolio? I'm currently looking for a remote or hybrid marketing opportunity. If you think I'd be a good fit for your team, let's chat! E-mail me or use the contact form below to get the conversation started!

Email me

  • chrissyroshak.marketing@gmail.com

Connect with me

  • @chrissyroshak

Contact Me

Fill out the form below, and I'll get back to you shortly.

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: chrissyroshak2
item.content:encoded:
Sculpting Success in the Marketing Sphere

Greetings! I'm Chrissy Roshak, a Marketing Manager with a love for the arts and a commitment to fostering diversity and inclusion. I'm also a passionate artist, and have over 9 years of experience in the staffing industry. I enjoy bringing a creative flair to the dynamic landscape of marketing. I'm currently on the lookout for opportunities that allow me to channel my passion into an art-focused environment or an industry that advocates for and celebrates diversity.

If you're seeking a Marketing professional who brings a blend of artistic passion, a commitment to diversity, and a strategic mindset to your team, let's connect. Together, we can create successful marketing campaigns that resonate, celebrate diversity, and contribute to a more vibrant and inclusive professional landscape.

what makes me different

The Skills and Values Shaping My Story

Palette of Skills

My journey has taken me from the canvas to the digital realm. Trained as a painter, I've embraced the exciting challenges of the marketing world, mastering everything from WordPress web design to email marketing. My toolkit includes graphic design, SEO optimization, and social media management, creating a harmonious blend of creativity and strategy.

Proven Impact

Numbers don't lie. I've optimized WordPress websites, resulting in significant improvements in search positions and a remarkable boost in monthly click-throughs. Analytics are my compass, guiding me to create content that resonates and campaigns that deliver

Creative Strategy

My journey is a fusion of marketing expertise and a profound connection to the arts. Trained as a painter with a strong foundation in color theory and art history, I am driven to bring a unique creative perspective to web design, email marketing campaigns and graphic design.

Advocacy for Diversity & Inclusion

My commitment to diversity and inclusion is not just a professional ethos; it's a personal mission. I believe in creating campaigns that authentically represent diverse voices, stories, and perspectives. I am eager to contribute my skills to industries that share this commitment to fostering a more inclusive and representative landscape.

Educational Foundation

My commitment to continuous learning is reflected in my academic journey, including a Graduate Certificate in Project Management, a Master of Arts in Teaching, and a Bachelor of Fine Arts in Painting. These qualifications underscore my dedication to staying ahead of industry trends while embracing the diverse intersections of art, education, and marketing.

Transitioning with Purpose

While open to staying in the staffing industry,I am excited about opportunities in the art world or any industry with a focus on diversity.Whether it's promoting artistic endeavors, engaging with diverse communities, or crafting campaigns that resonate with a broad spectrum of audiences, I am ready to bring my skills to spaces where creativity and inclusivity thrive.

While open to staying in the staffing industry,\u00a0I am excited about opportunities in the art world or any industry with a focus on diversity.<\/span>\u00a0<\/span>Whether it's promoting artistic endeavors, engaging with diverse communities, or crafting campaigns that resonate with a broad spectrum of audiences, I am ready to bring my skills to spaces where creativity and inclusivity thrive.<\/span><\/p>","_background_image":{"url":"","id":""},"_background_image_tablet":{"url":"","id":""},"_background_image_mobile":{"url":"","id":""},"_background_video_fallback":{"url":"","id":""},"_background_hover_image":{"url":"","id":""},"_background_hover_image_tablet":{"url":"","id":""},"_background_hover_image_mobile":{"url":"","id":""},"_background_hover_video_fallback":{"url":"","id":""},"_mask_image":{"url":"","id":""},"eael_tooltip_section_content":"I am a tooltip","eael_ext_content_protection_password_placeholder":"Enter Password","eael_ext_content_protection_password_submit_btn_txt":"Submit","eael_ext_content_protection_password_incorrect_message":"Password does not match.","eael_cl_logics":[{"_id":"7ef27c2"}],"pa_condition_repeater":[],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":false}]
Chrissy Roshak: Proven marketing professional with expertise in SEO, WordPress and graphic design, and a passion for art and diversity.

item.title: Marketing Work
item.dc:creator: chrissyroshak2
item.content:encoded:
Marketing Portfolio

Explore My Work

Welcome to my Marketing Portfolio! I invite you to explore samples of my work in web design & SEO, email marketing, print, social media, and more. These examples showcase the results of a creative and data-driven approach. I have a background in painting and art history, and transitioned into a full-time marketing role with a local staffing company in 2019 and spearheaded the creation of a new marketing department. In that role, I've had the pleasure of designing campaigns for both job seekers and business leaders across multiple states. I have developed a data-driven approach, optimizing content for higher conversions based on analytics and incorporating collaborative insights from internal teams to shape a comprehensive strategy. Emphasizing diversity and inclusion, my work reflects a broad spectrum of genders, races, and ages. Discover how my past experience has genuinely elevated the brand and made a meaningful impact on business.

item.title: Web Design & SEO
item.dc:creator: chrissyroshak2
item.content:encoded:
Local Staffing Company: Web design Overhaul

Year: 2020 - Present

As the Marketing Manager overseeing the transformation of a local staffing company's online presence, I took on the challenge of revitalizing an existing website and shaping it into a dynamic hub for both job seekers and employers. Spanning over the last few years, this ongoing web design project showcases my dedication to consistently enhancing the digital footprint of the company.

Key web design Achievements

SEO Enhancement

Implemented a comprehensive SEO strategy, consistently refreshing content and metadata, infusing relevant keywords, and leveraging data-driven insights. My proficiency in crafting and implementing schema markup for pages and posts played a pivotal role in optimizing the website. These efforts were instrumental in driving the significant advancements in Google search results, propelling the average position in Google Search results from 51 to 28. The number of monthly organic search impressions on Google saw a substantial increase, surging from 5.25k to an impressive 22.7k. This accomplishment highlights the success of a comprehensive approach, where established SEO techniques, including strategic keyword optimization, content quality improvement, and schema markup, played significant roles in enhancing the visibility and relevance of the website.

Feature-rich Enhancements

Enhanced the website by infusing interactive elements to create a more engaging experience for visitors. Implemented entrance animations, incorporated context-specific popups to provide relevant information, and set the hot jobs carousel to auto-scroll for enhanced user interaction. Additionally, integrated video content where applicable and introduced hover animations on page elements to encourage active engagement with the site. These personalized touches collectively contribute to a more dynamic and interactive online environment for users.

View a sample of my schema markup coding

New Page Development

Conceived and implemented the strategic expansion of the website, introducing a variety of new pages tailored to meet diverse user needs. This included the creation of individual branch pages, offering a localized experience for job seekers and clients in each region. At the time, these regions encompassed Tukwila, WA; Arlington, WA; Rancho Cucamonga, CA; and Reno, NV. The introduction of branch pages not only provided a more region-specific interface but also presented an opportunity to implement targeted location-based SEO elements, optimizing the site for search engine visibility in each area. Additionally, new pages such as a technical staffing page, sign-up page, field staff portal page, and individual job pages were seamlessly integrated to enhance the overall user experience and cater to specific user requirements.

Independent Contributions

Initiated and implemented a strategy to revamp and modernize existing pages. This work showcased proficiency in graphic design with a focus on inclusivity and diversity. Utilizing the advanced capabilities of Photoshop, including its latest AI design tools, I created and edited original graphic elements to enhance visual appeal.

I restructured key pages, such as Managed Services, Job Seekers, Employers, Refer a Friend, and Resources for Job Seekers. In doing so, I aimed not only to introduce a more visually appealing design but also to incorporate branding colors where absent, reinforcing a consistent and cohesive visual identity. Furthermore, I expanded the content on these pages significantly, not only to enhance the user experience but also to position the company's website as an authoritative source in the field. The content expansion, coupled with the thoughtful graphic design elements, aimed to establish a more robust and engaging presence, solidifying the company's standing as experts in the industry.

Content Creation & Web Design Management

Initiated and maintained a dynamic blog section on the website. I not only wrote the copy for the majority of the blog posts but also meticulously edited the content that was provided by others. I created a cohesive and visually appealing reading experience and edited the formatting and layout of each blog post to align seamlessly with company branding and the overall look and feel of the site.

In addition to managing our internal blog, I collaborated with a third-party marketing company to integrate resource centers for job seekers and employers. While the content for these resource centers is curated by the third party, I oversaw the integration with our site. To maximize the impact of these resource centers, I strategically created article highlight boxes across other pages of our site. These highlights showcase relevant resource center content, providing not only a valuable resource for visitors but also an opportunity to frequently update and refresh pages throughout the site. This strategic approach not only enhances user engagement but also serves as an effective SEO tactic by adding fresh and relevant content to pages across the website.

Strategic Collaborations

Established a collaborative partnership with the original web design company, the creators of the website, to enhance both aesthetics and functionality. In this initial phase, I worked closely with the team to update content and integrate new features. Subsequently, I orchestrated the migration of the site from its original host server to a new server, hosted by a second web design company. I facilitated communication between the two web design firms during the migration process to resolve issues encountered in transfer process. This transition resulted in a flawless experience for users, combining my content management expertise with the technical and security prowess of the second web design firm. The result is a website that not only maintains its visual appeal but also operates on an optimized and secure technical infrastructure.

Optimized Contact Forms

Developed targeted contact forms for various purposes to address specific business needs. The initial challenge involved inheriting a single, generic contact form, causing delays in directing messages to the appropriate recipients. To tackle this issue, I created distinct forms for different sections of the website, ensuring messages were efficiently routed to the relevant teams and individuals. For instance, contact forms on individual job pages were directed to specific recruiting teams based on job locations, while client page forms were routed to the sales team. The safety page's contact form was directed to our safety team, and forms on employee and job seeker pages were sent to the entire recruiting team, guaranteeing that messages reached recruiters in the appropriate locations.

In addition to managing contact forms, I navigated challenges during periods of high internal staff turnover, ensuring messages didn't get lost. Simultaneously, I took the lead in maintaining updated contact information across the website and other online platforms, particularly during significant transitions such as office relocations. This comprehensive approach not only streamlined communication but also contributed to a more seamless experience for both internal teams and external users.

View the Website

View the full website
View Blog
View a sample branch page
View Employers page
View Managed Services page
View Job Seekers page
View a sample job page
View Resources for Job Seekers page
View Refer a Friend landing page
View Safety page

Impact

These collective web design and SEO efforts have resulted in a website that not only reflects the company's ethos but has also significantly improved its online visibility and user engagement. This ongoing project stands as a testament to my strategic approach, collaborative spirit, and continuous commitment to elevating digital marketing initiatives for maximum impact.

As the Marketing Manager overseeing the transformation of a local staffing company's online presence, I took on the challenge of revitalizing an existing website and shaping it into a dynamic hub for both job seekers and employers. Spanning over the last few years, this ongoing web design project showcases my dedication to consistently enhancing the digital footprint of the company.

Implemented a comprehensive SEO strategy, consistently refreshing content and metadata, infusing relevant keywords, and leveraging data-driven insights. My proficiency in crafting and implementing schema markup for pages and posts played a pivotal role in optimizing the website. These efforts were instrumental in driving the significant advancements in Google search results, propelling the average position in Google Search results from 51 to 28. The number of monthly organic search impressions on Google saw a substantial increase, surging from 5.25k to an impressive 22.7k. This accomplishment highlights the success of a comprehensive approach, where established SEO techniques, including strategic keyword optimization, content quality improvement, and schema markup, played significant roles in enhancing the visibility and relevance of the website.

Enhanced the website by infusing interactive elements to create a more engaging experience for visitors. Implemented entrance animations, incorporated context-specific popups to provide relevant information, and set the hot jobs carousel to  auto-scroll for enhanced user interaction. Additionally, integrated video content where applicable and introduced hover animations on page elements to encourage active engagement with the site. These personalized touches collectively contribute to a more dynamic and interactive online environment for users.

Conceived and implemented the strategic expansion of the website, introducing a variety of new pages tailored to meet diverse user needs. This included the creation of individual branch pages, offering a localized experience for job seekers and clients in each region. At the time, these regions encompassed Tukwila, WA; Arlington, WA; Rancho Cucamonga, CA; and Reno, NV. The introduction of branch pages not only provided a more region-specific interface but also presented an opportunity to implement targeted location-based SEO elements, optimizing the site for search engine visibility in each area. Additionally, new pages such as a technical staffing page, sign-up page, field staff portal page, and individual job pages were seamlessly integrated to enhance the overall user experience and cater to specific user requirements.

Initiated and implemented a strategy to revamp and modernize existing pages. This work showcased proficiency in graphic design with a focus on inclusivity and diversity. Utilizing the advanced capabilities of Photoshop, including its latest AI design tools, I created and edited original graphic elements to enhance visual appeal.

I restructured key pages, such as Managed Services, Job Seekers, Employers, Refer a Friend, and Resources for Job Seekers. In doing so, I aimed not only to introduce a more visually appealing design but also to incorporate branding colors where absent, reinforcing a consistent and cohesive visual identity. Furthermore, I expanded the content on these pages significantly, not only to enhance the user experience but also to position the company's website as an authoritative source in the field. The content expansion, coupled with the thoughtful graphic design elements, aimed to establish a more robust and engaging presence, solidifying the company's standing as experts in the industry.

Initiated and maintained a dynamic blog section on the website. I not only wrote the copy for the majority of the blog posts but also meticulously edited the content that was provided by others. I created a cohesive and visually appealing reading experience and edited the formatting and layout of each blog post to align seamlessly with company branding and the overall look and feel of the site.

In addition to managing our internal blog, I collaborated with a third-party marketing company to integrate resource centers for job seekers and employers. While the content for these resource centers is curated by the third party, I oversaw the integration with our site. To maximize the impact of these resource centers, I strategically created article highlight boxes across other pages of our site. These highlights showcase relevant resource center content, providing not only a valuable resource for visitors but also an opportunity to frequently update and refresh pages throughout the site. This strategic approach not only enhances user engagement but also serves as an effective SEO tactic by adding fresh and relevant content to pages across the website.

Established a collaborative partnership with the original web design company, the creators of the website, to enhance both aesthetics and functionality. In this initial phase, I worked closely with the team to update content and integrate new features. Subsequently, I orchestrated the migration of the site from its original host server to a new server, hosted by a second web design company. I facilitated communication between the two web design firms during the migration process to resolve issues encountered in transfer process. This transition resulted in a flawless experience for users, combining my content management expertise with the technical and security prowess of the second web design firm. The result is a website that not only maintains its visual appeal but also operates on an optimized and secure technical infrastructure.

Developed targeted contact forms for various purposes to address specific business needs. The initial challenge involved inheriting a single, generic contact form, causing delays in directing messages to the appropriate recipients. To tackle this issue, I created distinct forms for different sections of the website, ensuring messages were efficiently routed to the relevant teams and individuals. For instance, contact forms on individual job pages were directed to specific recruiting teams based on job locations, while client page forms were routed to the sales team. The safety page's contact form was directed to our safety team, and forms on employee and job seeker pages were sent to the entire recruiting team, guaranteeing that messages reached recruiters in the appropriate locations.

In addition to managing contact forms, I navigated challenges during periods of high internal staff turnover, ensuring messages didn't get lost. Simultaneously, I took the lead in maintaining updated contact information across the website and other online platforms, particularly during significant transitions such as office relocations. This comprehensive approach not only streamlined communication but also contributed to a more seamless experience for both internal teams and external users.

item.title: Email Marketing
item.dc:creator: chrissyroshak2
item.content:encoded:
Email Campaigns

Year: 2019 - Present

Email Campaign: Hot Candidates

These B2B hot candidate email campaigns exemplify my ability to create highly effective marketing campaigns that not only resonate with the audience but also drive tangible results.

  • Audience Segmentation: Successfully segmented the candidate audience by location, ensuring the delivery of highly relevant candidates to potential employers. This strategic approach maximizes engagement and effectiveness.
  • Data-Driven Candidate Summaries: Leveraged information from our candidate database to create persuasive candidate summaries. Highlighting strengths and key attributes, these summaries effectively communicated the value each candidate brings to potential employers.
  • High Engagement Rates: Achieved the engagement rates well above the industry average for B2B email click through rates (industry average is 3.2%) with these hot candidate emails, indicating the effectiveness of this targeted and tailored content in capturing the attention of local employers.

  • Sales Impact: These emails not only drove sales but also provided valuable data for the sales team. The insights gained about prospective clients interested in hiring contribute to informed decision-making and strategic sales efforts.

View Sample Hot Candidates Emails
Subject: Brrr-illiant Candidates Available! Warm Up Your Hiring with These Top 5 Performers
(This email had a 17% click through rate)
Subject: Hiring Spree: These StarZ are Ready to Start NOW!
(This email had a 10% click through rate)
Subject: (Reader Name), have you noticed something missing?
(This email was targeted to a segmented audience of prospective clients & had a 6% click through rate)
Subject: Stuff Your Team with Top Talent This Season!
(This email was targeted to a segmented audience of past clients & had an 8% click through rate)
Subject: Spice up your team this fall!
(This email had a 24% click through rate)
Subject: Build Your Winning Team!
(This email was targeted to a segmented audience of prospective clients & had a 6% click through rate)

(This email had a 17% click through rate)
Subject: Hiring Spree: These StarZ are Ready to Start NOW!
(This email had a 10% click through rate)

(This email was targeted to a segmented audience of prospective clients & had a 6% click through rate)
Subject: Stuff Your Team with Top Talent This Season!
(This email was targeted to a segmented audience of past clients & had an 8% click through rate)
Subject: Spice up your team this fall!
(This email had a 24% click through rate)
Subject: Build Your Winning Team!
(This email was targeted to a segmented audience of prospective clients & had a 6% click through rate)

Email Campaign: Hot Jobs

I designed hot jobs emails for job seekers in multiple locations. Tis section highlights my expertise in developing targeted email campaigns. My experience extends beyond connecting job seekers with opportunities in the light industrial marketI do so with a strong emphasis on inclusivity and a community-focused approach.

  • Hyper-targeting: Successfully engaged specific audiences in defined regions.
  • Diversity & Inclusion: Incorporated inclusive imagery and language, fostering connectiona universal approach for broad market acceptance.
  • Seasonal & Local Flair: Adapted campaigns to seasonal and local contexts, a versatile skill enhancing relevance and impact across different consumer bases.
  • Real-world Results: Systematically tested day and time slots, showcasing proficiency in data-driven decision-making for optimal engagement.
  • Enhanced Brand Perception: Built a forward-thinking and community-minded brand image, universally beneficial for positive brand perception.
View Sample Hot Jobs Emails
Subject: Warm Up This Winter with a Hot New Job!

These B2B hot candidate email campaigns exemplify my ability to create highly effective marketing campaigns that not only resonate with the audience but also drive tangible results.<\/p>

  • Audience Segmentation:<\/strong> Successfully segmented the candidate audience by location, ensuring the delivery of highly relevant candidates to potential employers. This strategic approach maximizes engagement and effectiveness.<\/li>
  • Data-Driven Candidate Summaries:<\/strong> Leveraged information from our candidate database to create persuasive candidate summaries. Highlighting strengths and key attributes, these summaries effectively communicated the value each candidate brings to potential employers.<\/li>
  • High Engagement Rates:<\/strong> Achieved the engagement rates well above the industry average for B2B email click through rates (industry average is 3.2%) with these hot candidate emails, indicating the effectiveness of this targeted and tailored content in capturing the attention of local employers.\u00a0<\/li>

  • Sales Impact:<\/strong> These emails not only drove sales but also provided valuable data for the sales team. The insights gained about prospective clients interested in hiring contribute to informed decision-making and strategic sales efforts.<\/p><\/li><\/ul>","eael_tooltip_section_content":"I am a item.title: Blog Posts
item.dc:creator: chrissyroshak2
item.content:encoded:
Year: 2020 - Present

Blog Posts for a local staffing company

Explore samples of my blog posts below. Every word was purposefully selected to combine an engaging tone that resonates with the target audience with strategic SEO optimization.

Moreover, my approach involves in-depth research into what people are actively looking for on search engines (like Google). Coupled with insights from the company's Google Analytics and social media analytics, this comprehensive strategy ensures a data-driven content creation process. By aligning content with commonly searched terms and popular topics, each blog post not only captures attention but directly addresses the audience's needs.

Furthermore, this commitment to relevance extends beyond mere engagement, contributing significantly to improved search engine visibility and ranking.

Visual Story Telling

I personally selected and edited all of the graphics for each blog post. I meticulously chose and designed the images to align with the text, complementing and elevating the narrative. Additionally, I carefully chose images that not only showcase diversity but also align with the varied demographics of the community the company serves.

WordPress Proficiency in Action

Behind the scenes, I designed the layout for each blog post in WordPress to strategically enhance the flow of the text. The layout is purposefully designed to weave visuals and white space throughout, steering clear of clutter and providing a reader-friendly experience. This makes the content easily digestible.

Schema Markup

I hand-coded schema markup for each blog post to ensure optimal search engine visibility. This enhances each post's online presence and discoverability, contributing to an effective overall digital strategy.

View Sample Blog Posts
Holiday Recipes: Staff Favorites
Mastering LinkedIn: A Comprehensive Playbook For Job Seekers
How To Write A Resume Thatll Get You Hired
Interview Prep: Get Ready To Land The Job
When Should You Announce A New Job On LinkedIn?
Holiday Recipes: Staff Favorites
Mastering LinkedIn: A Comprehensive Playbook For Job Seekers
How To Write A Resume Thatll Get You Hired
Interview Prep: Get Ready To Land The Job
When Should You Announce A New Job On LinkedIn?
